param.name: available
param.description: true if you want to retrieve all available Zones. False if you only want to return the Zones from which you have at least one VM. Default is false.

param.name: domainid
param.description: the ID of the domain associated with the zone

param.name: showcapacities
param.description: flag to display the capacity of the zones

response.name: allocationstate
response.description: the allocation state of the cluster

response.name: dhcpprovider
response.description: the dhcp Provider for the Zone

response.name: displaytext
response.description: the display text of the zone

response.name: dns1
response.description: the first DNS for the Zone

response.name: dns2
response.description: the second DNS for the Zone

response.name: domain
response.description: Network domain name for the networks in the zone

response.name: domainid
response.description: the ID of the containing domain, null for public zones

response.name: domainname
response.description: the name of the containing domain, null for public zones

response.name: guestcidraddress
response.description: the guest CIDR address for the Zone

response.name: internaldns1
response.description: the first internal DNS for the Zone

response.name: internaldns2
response.description: the second internal DNS for the Zone

response.name: networktype
response.description: the network type of the zone; can be Basic or Advanced

response.name: securitygroupsenabled
response.description: true if security groups support is enabled, false otherwise

response.name: vlan
response.description: the vlan range of the zone
